paper_title.ja: エマルション潤滑におけるSiCおよびSi<sub>3</sub> N<sub>4</sub> の摩擦摩耗特性
筆記具のトライボロジー
固体潤滑剤の最近の動向
スピンコーティング法により作製したSr<sub>0.14</sub> Ca<sub>0.86</sub> Cu O<sub>2</sub> 系薄膜のトライボロジー特性
paper_title.en: Tribological Properties of Sr-Ca-Cu-O Films Prepared by Spin Coating Method

description.ja: Sr-Ca-Cu-O complex oxide thin films were prepared at different firing temperatures using a spin coating method. Sr<Sub>0.14</Sub>Ca<Sub>0.86</Sub>CuO<Sub>2</Sub> having layer structure could be prepared at lower temperatures and the method was compared with ordinary firing methods. However, the single phase of Sr<Sub>0.14</Sub>Ca<Sub>0.86</Sub>CuO<Sub>2</Sub> was not obtained under such spin coating conditions as in this study. The friction properties of four spin coating films sliding against a cemented carbide ball were investigated using a Bowden-Leben type friction tester. Comparatively low friction coefficient and high wear resistance under non-lubrication conditions were obtained with these complex oxide films.
description.en: Sr-Ca-Cu-O complex oxide thin films were prepared at different firing temperatures using a spin coating method. Sr<Sub>0.14</Sub>Ca<Sub>0.86</Sub>CuO<Sub>2</Sub> having layer structure could be prepared at lower temperatures and the method was compared with ordinary firing methods. However, the single phase of Sr<Sub>0.14</Sub>Ca<Sub>0.86</Sub>CuO<Sub>2</Sub> was not obtained under such spin coating conditions as in this study. The friction properties of four spin coating films sliding against a cemented carbide ball were investigated using a Bowden-Leben type friction tester. Comparatively low friction coefficient and high wear resistance under non-lubrication conditions were obtained with these complex oxide films.
